page.title: 19OPINIONS
page.content: Most people who were interviewed in {Horsley High Street}lived locally. There is no big supermarket in Horsley so people who do not live locally have no need to go into the area.For main{shopping}people prefer to travel to Guildford, Cobham or Leatherhead for a wider selection of shops. Many of the shoppers said that they came to live in Horsley because it is quiet,attractive and has clean air.The {houses}therefore are expensive.An example of this is a semi-detatched {three bedroomed house}would cost from {Â£70,000.}There are many{amenities}such as:tennis courts and a golf club plus it has good medical and educational facilities.
